name: Carriage Social
description:
Thank you for visiting!

Carriage Social is a collaborative game made for the London Transport Museum Friday Late event (Friday 28th February 2020). Participants were invited to create new characters through drawing and collage, then see them jump from paper to screen and join a Tube-wide party. 

Scroll right and left to see all the partygoers added during the evening. You can use keyboard (right, left, space) or the tap the buttons onscreen.
